code.description: Code to be displayed in the editor.
code.title: code

editorTheme.title: editorTheme
editorTheme.description: Accepts any monaco editor theme, with predefined options 'cv-light' and 'cv-dark'.

hideCount.title: hideCount
hideCount.description: Toggles the visibility of the execution count display.

hideEditor.title: hideEditor
hideEditor.description: Toggles the visibility of the code editor.

index.title: index
index.description: Index or position of the component within a list.

language.description: Programming language used for syntax highlighting in the editor.
language.title: language

loading.title: loading
loading.description: Indicates whether the component is in a loading state.

selected.title: selected
selected.description: Indicates whether the component is currently selected.

timesExecuted.title: timesExecuted
timesExecuted.description: Number of times the code has been executed.
